programme.title: Cucu Atuk
programme.desc: Pak Zubir menjaga cucunya, Aiman yang menjadi yatim piatu apabila kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan. Bapa Aiman seorang usahawan berjaya dan telah mewasiatkan harta yang banyak kepada Aiman. Pak Ngah dan Mak Ngahnya berniat jahat untuk membolot harta tersebut. Niat mereka didorong apabila Juwita meminjam wang daripada Ah Long dan gagal melunaskan pinjaman.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Milik Kita
programme.desc: Raisya gadis berkerjaya hebat, bijak dan disegani ramai. Suatu hari penghawa dingin di pejabat Raisya mengalami kerosakan, maka seorang juruteknik dihantar untuk memeriksa. Itulah detik pertama kali Raisya bertentang mata dengan Nik Luqman. Namun Rasya sedar Luqman jauh lebih muda dari dirinya. Akhirnya dengan penuh keberanian Raisya sendiri yang melamar Luqman untuk dirinya.

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep1
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep191
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep59
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Welcome To Hati Neng Galon
programme.desc: Berkawan sejak kecil hingga dewasa membuatkan Tarie dan Jaka saling terbuka dengan keadaan masing-masing, bahkan saat Jaka terpaksa bekerja dengan latar belakang yang sukar diterima ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep13
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep46
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep21
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each others backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Once In A Summer

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Our stories
programme.desc: Hosted by Hua Shao, the show invites a group of guests in each episode to discuss social development and humanistic spirit, and discover the unique cultural concepts and implications of the era. The guests include Nie Wen Ping, Deng Ya Ping, Ke Jie, Gu Li, etc.

programme.title: The Talent
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. Finally, the one who can fulfill all of the concepts would be picked. The guests include Ma Qing Yun, Annie Yi, and Sunnee.

programme.title: Yell For Fun
programme.desc: Bosco Wong, Chen Zhuoxuan, Li Yajuan, Wang Mian, Zhang Jiayuan, Zhang Xiaowan, etc. who are entrusted to formulate a themed carnival full of wild fun every week. They used their creativity to turn a wilderness into a place integrating art, fashion and wild fun. It presents a variety show feast that expresses the "wild" attitude of contemporary young people.

programme.title: City All In Tribe Season 2
programme.desc: A reality show to invite Justin Huang, Hankiz Omar, Li Hongyi, Victor Qin, Zhao Xiaotang with other guests to unlock the new style of the city with a new and upgraded story-style gameplay. They will play via games and challenges for audience to know more about the cities. What a good energetic and humorous way to discover the local charismas.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2

programme.title: Informal Talks Season 7
programme.desc: The program is a Chinese talk show with culture discussion. Four members, Ryan Zuo, Di Yang, Ming Chen and Cynthia Chan, act as the presidium gathered with 11 representatives from different countries who all spoken in Putonghua share their opinions in a humorous manner.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep1314
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5556
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep116
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Taiwan National Day 2023(M) Ep1
programme.desc: This year's National Day Convention has the theme of "Democratic Taiwan, Resilience and Sustainability" It uses the three elements of the national flag as the main axis. With curved and soft lines, it symbolizes the gentle and tenacious attitude of the Taiwanese people. In addition, this year we also invited Tokyo University of Agriculture Second High School Brass Band, known as the "Emerald Knight", to perform on the same stage with the Chien Kuo High School Marching Band to embrace the friendship between Taiwan & Japan.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep116

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1415
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep181182
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep181182
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47184719
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1853
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3686
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2096
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep6
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Island of Fire
programme.desc: A cop goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer. When the prison warden enrols him and other inmates for a secret mission, he finally finds the murderer.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are finally revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam and the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop. The infernal gates are open to the worst of times...

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Hagola Ep50

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep14

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Choron Ka Chor
programme.desc: A fearless outlaw offers to safeguard the daughter of his accomplice in return for a map to a secret diamond mine. However, his quest is compromised after a bandit gets wind of the secret map.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem falls in love with Jenny, a woman who is already in love with a man named Rahul. Despite this, he agrees to help her marry him and even gets into several comical situations as a result.

programme.title: Mumbai Delhi Mumbai
programme.desc: Pia travels to Delhi to meet a prospective groom whom she is determined to turn down. However, fate plays a tricky game on her when she meets her soulmate in the very city that she dreads visiting.

programme.title: Aaj Ka Shoorveer
programme.desc: When Gemini, a gangster, falls in love with a girl, he tries to reform his ways. Things change when a new police commissioner is transferred to the city, who plans on ending all criminal activities.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani

programme.title: Watan Ke Rakhwale

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala
programme.desc: Ibrahim, a police inspector, gets posted in a village with a very low crime rate. In pursuit of an adventurous life, he plans to obtain a transfer with the help of local thugs, but his plan backfires.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Rowdy Cheetah
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with a woman and they decide to get married. However, unknown to him, he has inherited an ancient curse that will kill him before the year ends.

programme.title: Ek Jaanbaaz Police Officer

programme.title: Elvis
programme.desc: From Oscar-nominated visionary filmmaker Baz Luhrmann comes Warner Bros. Pictures' drama Elvis, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.The film explores the life and music of Elvis Presley (Butler), seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). The story delves into the complex dynamic between Presley and Parker spanning over 20 years, from Presley's rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the most significant and influential people in Elvis's life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).'

programme.desc: Awkwafina & Teresa Hsiao - Nora meets Awkwafina, who gives her a new perspective. She buys Mr. Moon's bodega and decides to stay in Queens with her family. Wally and Brenda get married! Grandma is happy that her family is happy.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a divorced dockworker and estranged from his two children of whom he has custody on weekends.

programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: Love In Bangkok
programme.desc: Architect Laura Brunel is sent to Bangkok to create plans for a mall. She meets Marc, a manager of an NGO that runs orphanages, and falls in love with him. However, she must tell him that her project will involve the destruction of the local orphanage.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parents house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the Karnaval brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over lifes troubles and silver linings.

programme.title: Home Front
programme.desc: Called up to fight in the Algerian war in 1960, four veterans are forced to confront their past more than forty years after they have returned to France. Despite keeping silent all this while, small events spark painful memories of their untold stories.

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenagers web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.

programme.title: The Fees
programme.desc: Ocir and Joni are filming a tourism video project for the local government and they soon find themselves mired in a web of institutional corruption, and they find their budget being slowly taken away by corrupt officials with their fees.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Kokowaah
programme.desc: Henry gets a second chance at success and love when he is hired to co-write a screenplay with his ex-girlfriend. But when a little girl turns up at his door claiming to be his daughter from a one-night stand 8 years ago, everything changes forever.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parents and Irenes marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.desc: A neurologist suddenly jumps off a bridge in front of his wife during a stroll. An autopsy shows that it was not suicide but a well-calibrated murder. With details still hazy, Alexander, the forensic pathologist, is pressured to come up with answers.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling theyve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: Lawyer without a license Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q freak out a focus group by reading ridiculous answers, and then participate in a thrilling toilet paper shootout in their favorite market. Plus, the loser's fancy dinner party turns into the messiest ride of his life.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 13
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 1
programme.desc: Michael stuns customers in a holistic store by treating them to kale cannolis that are too good to be true. Later, while working in a toy store, Michael shocks his coworker by bringing a large teddy bear to life.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 2
programme.desc: Michael confuses variety store customers with products that have secret hideaways; astonishes camping store patrons with rafts that come in pill form; and convinces a woman that a tiny propeller enables human levitation.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 3
programme.desc: Michael tests gravity when he floats the idea of astronaut snacks; his darkness-triggering popcorn is too newfangled for one movie goer; and he astonishes an antique store employee with glass figurines that feel emotion and repair themselves!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 4
programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.desc: When Iris and Nia Nal fall into a fever dream that explores different possibilities for their lives, Barry, Chester, Allegra and Cecile desperately try to help them.

programme.title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
programme.desc: An inventive eleven year-old New Yorkers discovery of a key in his deceased father's belongings sets him off on an urgent search across the city for the lock it will open.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiance, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: "Hereafter" tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George (Matt Damon) is a blue-collar American with a special connection to the afterlife dating from his childhood. On the other side of the world, Marie (Ccile De France), a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when London schoolboy Marcus (Frankie and George McLaren) loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each seeking the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter. Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this haunting original tale from a screenplay by two-time Oscar nominee Peter Morgan.

programme.desc: Vanessa Hudgens - After a breath-taking repel from a helicopter, Bear and Hollywood actor Vanessa Hudgens evade a boulder avalanche, summit a massive dormant volcano and come face-to-face with a rattlesnake.

programme.title: The Hunt S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Race Against Time - The coast can be a rich hunting ground, but opportunities never last long so hunters are always in a race against time.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep7
programme.desc: 41 days since the start on Canada's Pacific coast, the teams now have the Atlantic within their reach, lapping the shores of the seventh checkpoint at the seaside town of Liverpool, Nova Scotia.

programme.desc: Boots - Gregg Wallace visits a boot factory in Wollaston, Northamptonshire to follow the production of a pair of Dr. Martens, while Cherry Healey gets to grips with the machines that make shoelaces.

programme.desc: Chatham Islands - Neil Oliver visits living Moriori artefacts and Michael Stevens hears about the day the Germans infiltrated the islands' waters during World War 2.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaners - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey reveal the secrets behind production on an epic scale. This time they discover how a humble but hardy 'Henry' the vacuum cleaner is produced.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me S1 Ep2
programme.desc: We follow Savannah and her four cubs in the Tswalu Kalahari Reserve, and Chili and her five kittens in the Great Karoo Wilderness - as they navigate a harsh environment, dangerous wildlife and dwindling prey.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Robson is joined by Hairy Biker Si King to visit some wild cattle at the Chillingham estate and explore the health benefits of group drumming in an outdoor music session.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Former footballer Les Ferdinand is coerced into the North Sea in a wetsuit as he joins Robson Green on a short break in Northumberland packed with memories and laughter.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Pulled Under - On the Parana river, countless fishermen have been violently pulled into the water and some have even mysteriously disappeared. Cyril ventures deeper and deeper into caiman to answer one question: what beast could possibly be strong enough to pull a man under?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Nick Jonas - Nick Jonas joins Bear for a snowy mountain adventure in the Sierra Nevada during blizzard conditions. The guys rappel down a sheer cliff, eat a frozen bird and swim across a freezing lake.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazils beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Tricksters - The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Big Move - The Lilayi Elephant Nursery near Lusaka in Zambia is home to four orphan elephants. The two oldest, four-year- olds Musolole and Zambezi, have been here since they were just a few months old. These boisterous babies are out-growing the nursery and its time to move to big school. Two hundred miles away, in the heart of Kafue National Park, lies elephant heaven - Camp Phoenix, the projects release facility, where older orphans are already adapting to life in the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Zambia's Peaceful Primates - Kasanka National Park in Zambia is home to an unusual species of baboon. Kinda baboons have turned their backs on the aggressive displays of dominance usually associated with these large monkeys and lead altogether more peaceful lives. Living alongside one troop is a dedicated team of researchers whose mission it is to uncover these baboons secrets and understand what makes them who they are.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazils beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dung Beetles: Nature's Recycler - There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africas giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino - T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazils beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Isle Royale - Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Invaders from the Deep - As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lemurs of Madagascar - The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Monkey Garden - At the southern edge of the Pantanal, the worlds largest tropical wetland on Earth, theres a placelike no other, and a wildlife so diverse scientists scramble to understand the variety of ways animals interact with each other. The highlands of the Bodoquena Hills are the entrance to the murky wetlands of the Pantanal. Here, the waters are crystal clear, filtered by a limestone formation over 600 million year old, that offers a clear window into the life of these streams. Waterfalls, tufa dams, caves and pristine rivers with a visibility of up to fifty meters abound.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazils beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: In for the Kill - Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Hungry Leopard - A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: In for the Kill

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Hungry Leopard - A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Goby Effect - The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Bad Reputations - Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wanderers of the Lost Forest - This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bird Paradise - Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death on the Plains - Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africas last wild places. Only the toughest of Africas wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Pride Lands - Spend one day and one night in Zambias Luangwa Valley with Africas most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they havent managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Leopard's Last Stand - A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Goby Effect - The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S12 Ep11
programme.desc: For Lovers And Lottery Winners - David joins a lucky family on their hunt for a dream home that has separate rooms for the kids and a huge garden in Richmond, Virginia.

programme.title: Buy It Or Build It S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Party Of Five - Chris shows a growing family a fixer-upper with possibility, while Calvin plans to build a spacious new home.

programme.title: Battle On The Beach S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kitchen Knockdown - Taniya Nayak, Ty Pennington and Alison Victoria mentor three new teams of talented renovators competing to bring the most value to their kitchens.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Overlapping Mortgages - Real estate expert Tarek El Moussa lends his knowledge to novice flippers. Whether its budget issues or permitting problems, Tarek has the answers.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt Renovation S3 Ep10
programme.desc: North Carolina Renewal - After a recent medical scare, a woman is ready to live life to the fullest in Morehead City, NC.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Around The World In 100 Days - Mika and Brian look to create a dream home for a pair of US service members currently in South Korea.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Run Reno - An athletic family of four love their home, but their sons' indoor play has left their walls full of scuffs and the floors in need of repair.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2015
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2015 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep3
programme.desc: Wherefore Art Thou Trollhunter? - Jim is not welcomed by the Trolls as their new Trollhunter, and he suffers a humiliating defeat at the hands of Draal

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep4
programme.desc: Gnome Your Enemy - Jim undertakes his first Trollhunting mission by starting small: he must shrink down to eight inches tall to apprehend a mischievous gnome.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleos over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep7
programme.desc: Naked Mole Wrath/Momma Leaf - The Mighty Ones think they are being menaced by a vicious mole rat, but it's a case of mistaken identity. / Leaf discovers eggs stuck to his body and enlists Twig's help so he can be a good momma.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep13
programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep14
programme.desc: Team Astrid - After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.
